head_office_address: via Oberdan, 6/a Brescia (registered office) via G. Paglia, 45 (plant)
eu_initiatives: As a committed member, Lucchini RS has contributed to the papers issued by UNIFE, and more specifically to all papers published by ERWA, the UNIFE organ committed to the wheelset industry. See www.unife.com for more details on ERWA.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
Lucchini RS is currently a participant of the following working group at European level: Public Affairs and Legislation: 
-    Presiding Board of Unife 
-    Strategy Committee of Unife 
-    Trade and International Affairs Committee of Unife 
-    Development Committee of ERWA 
Technical expert groups: 
-    Technical Committee of ERWA (chair) 
-    CEN TC 256 / SC2 / WG 11 (normalisation for wheelsets) 
-    UNI Commission CT050 (Italian National Standardisation Body) 
-    JNF UP Task Force Broken Wheels, chaired by the European Union Agency for Railways 
Shift2Rail: Lucchini RS runs several projects under the Shift2Rail umbrella.
goals__remit: Lucchini RS Group is an international group headquartered in Italy which offers a diversified range of high-tech products and services, whose core business is the design and  manufacturing of high-end railway solutions and overhaul service. It operates through an Italian industrial holding company (Lucchini RS S.p.A.) and a network of several subsidiary companies in Europe, Africa, America and Asia. Lead by the ambition of manufacturing innovative products to meet people’s needs, the strengths of the Group lie in its integrated production facilities and its commitment to principles of sustainability.
